frozen.name: higan
frozen.shortDescription: An open-source, cycle-accurate Nintendo multi-system emulator
frozen.longDescription:
Higan (formerly bsnes) is a Nintendo multi-system emulator.
It currently supports the following systems:
  Famicom; Super Famicom;
  Game Boy; Game Boy Color; Game Boy Advance
higan also supports the following subsystems:
  Super Game Boy; BS-X Satellaview; Sufami Turbo
